item.title: Wallets overview
item.description: You can use one or all of them, it’s up to you. Overview Rhombus Desktop is a recommended wallet for most users as it offers the best of Rhombus’s features, including Rhombus Open Marketplace. Desktop Main, desktop wallets for Windows, macOS and Linux Rhombus Desktop – Main, feature-rich wallet for Rhombus with all bells and whistles Rhombus Core – Qt-based wallet focused on stability and advanced features Rhombus Copay – Mobile & desktop wallet with multi-sig for increased security Hardware Compatible hardware wallets for usage with Rhombus Core

item.title: Hardware wallets
item.description: Advantages They have major advantages over standard software wallets: private keys are stored in a protected area of a microcontroller, and cannot be transferred out of the device in plaintext. That means your funds are safe even when connected to an infected or malicious computer or a phishing/scam web page. Supported hardware wallets Ledger wallet Rhombus is currently supported by Ledger Wallet and has been integrated in such a way that it supports cold staking.
